# Kingdom Of Us

## Kingdom of Us

| runtime        = 109 minutes
| country        = United Kingdom
| language       = English
| budget         =
| gross          =
}}
Kingdom of Us is a 2017 documentary film directed by Lucy Cohen and featuring Jamie-Jodie, Kacie-Kimie, Lorie-Lanie, Mirie-Marie, Nikita-Nina, Pippa-Peita and Vikie Shanks.
The film was released by Netflix on October 13, 2017.
Premise
The documentary follows how the seven children of Paul and Vikie Shanks, four of whom are autistic, are coping with life and handling the traumatic event of their father's 2007 suicide.
Protagonists
* Jamie-Jodie Shanks
* Kacie-Kimie Shanks
* Lorie-Lanie Shanks
* Mirie-Marie Shanks
* Nikita-Nina Shanks
* Pippa-Peita Shanks
* Vikie Shanks
Release
Kingdom of Us was released on October 13, 2017 on Netflix streaming.
